content.rendered:
Open Boxing Tournament at Melbourne Pavilion

Get ready for an electrifying night of boxing at the Melbourne Pavilion, featuring both elite and amateur fighters in an open tournament. Witness top-tier athletes and promising amateurs as they go head-to-head in thrilling bouts, showcasing their prowess and determination. This tournament promises high-energy action, exceptional sportsmanship, and an unforgettable experience for all boxing enthusiasts. Join us for an evening of intense competition and support your favorite fighters as they strive for victory in the ring. Don’t miss out on this premier boxing event in Melbourne!
